Services.1: Website development services, from simple landing pages to complex e-commerce platforms. Services include development, deployment, maintenance.
Services.2: Engaging Telegram mini apps and bots developed to automate tasks and enhance user interaction. Specialized Telegram bot development services for seamless integration.
Services.3: Robust and scalable web applications (e.g., CRM, project management tools) tailored to specific business needs. Web application development services encompass front-end/back-end development, database design, and API integration.
Services.4: Custom APIs designed and developed for seamless system communication, connecting services to external platforms. API integration services available to extend functionality and automate data exchange.

Resume.title: About me
Resume.description: I am a full-stack developer with a passion for crafting digital experiences. I have experience in various programming languages and technologies, and I am always eager to learn new things.
